ModMetaData.name: Planning Extended
ModMetaData.author: Scherub
ModMetaData.description:
This mod adds a more advanced planning menu.
Features
- Draw colored designations, such as walls, doors, objects and floors - Optionally skip (don't overwrite) already placed plan designations - Use different shapes, e.g. points, lines, rectangles - Load / Save plan blueprints, quickly select last loaded plans - Cut / Copy / Paste your plans - Undo / Redo your planned actions - Show / Hide your planning designations (incl. global shortcut) - Change plan texture sets and opacity for each plan type individually - Convert your plans from vanilla RimWorld or MorePlanning mod - More coming soon
